data: bed No. 10 | Ward 11 | Massachusetts General Hospital
At this present moment of time I am what the doctors call an interesting case, and am to be found in bed No. 10, Ward 11, Massachusetts General Hospital.
The Autobiography of a Quack, and The Case of George Dedlow
